name: Adidas Runners WWWR - Yoga Session
about: Join us in training together as a community free of cost. Carry your own hydration refills. No baggage counter is available.

name: Adidas Runners WWWR - Ally Special
about: Join us in running together as a community free of cost. Carry your own hydration refills. No baggage counter available.

name: Adidas Runners Core Activation + Easy Run
about:
Join us for a perfect start to your running session! This event combines a focused core activation workout with an easy-paced run to enhance your overall fitness and running efficiency.

This session is open to everyone, from beginners to seasoned runners. Whether you're kickstarting your fitness journey or adding variety to your routine, you'll find this session both energizing and rewarding.

name: Adidas Runners Back To Basics - Beginner Special
about: Take your first step into the world of running with our Beginner Special: Back to Basics session! This event is designed to help new runners build confidence, understand running fundamentals, and kickstart their journey in a supportive community.

name: Adidas Runners Band Activation + Easy Run
about:
Get ready to enhance your running performance with our Band Activation + Easy Run session! This event combines targeted resistance band exercises with a relaxed run, perfect for strengthening muscles and improving mobility.

Open to all runners, whether you're new to running or looking to enhance your warm-up routine with effective activation techniques.

name: Adidas Runners Aerobic Run + Stretching
about:
Boost your endurance and recovery with our Aerobic Run + Stretching session! This event blends a steady-paced aerobic run with a guided stretching routine to enhance your performance and flexibility.

This session is ideal for runners of all levels who want to work on their endurance and finish feeling refreshed and relaxed.

name: Adidas Runners Easy Run + Strength Training
about:
Level up your running game with our Strength Training + Easy Run session! This event combines targeted strength exercises with a relaxed run to boost your endurance, power, and overall performance.

Perfect for runners of all experience levels, from beginners to seasoned athletes, looking to complement their training with strength-building exercises.

name: Adidas Runners Fartlek run + Mobility
about:
Add variety and fun to your training with our Fartlek Run + Mobility session! This event combines an energizing Fartlek workout with a focused mobility session to improve your speed, adaptability, and overall flexibility.

Fartlek Run: 
A Swedish term meaning "speed play," this run alternates between bursts of faster running and periods of easy recovery. It’s an unstructured, free-flowing workout that improves endurance, speed, and mental strength.

Ideal for runners of all levels who want to break away from monotony, challenge their pace, and improve their mobility.

name: Adidas Runners Circuit Training + Easy Run
about: Mix things up and elevate your fitness with our Circuit Training + Easy Run session! This event combines high-energy circuit exercises with a relaxed run to build strength, endurance, and overall athletic performance.

name: Adidas Runners WWWR - 5K run + Stretching
about:
Celebrate the spirit of community and empowerment with our With Women We Run (WWWR) - 5K Run + Stretching session! This global campaign encourages women to take strides toward their fitness goals in a supportive and inspiring environment.

This session is open to women of all running abilities. Come solo or bring a friend to experience the joy of running in a strong and encouraging community.
